title: Subchapter D - Mineral Resources (mined Land Reclamation)
content:
Subchapter D - Mineral Resources (mined Land Reclamation)

State Regulations

Part 420 - General (§ 420.1 to 420.2)

Part 421 - Permits (§ 421.1 to 421.5)

Part 422 - Mined Land-use Plan (§ 422.1 to 422.4)

Part 423 - Reclamation Bond (§ 423.1 to 423.4)

Part 424 - Enforcement (§ 424.1 to 424.2)

Part 425 - Civil Penalties (§ 425.1)

Part 426 - Repealed

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
